Original elements, such as an original story in which Hero and others of "truth and Mikuni matchless", and "Warring States matchless" both series plays an active part, and a team battle system which will be 3 sets  and it fights, have obtained high support from you, users.  The general in whom "WARRIORS OROCHI3" used as the latest work exceeds 120 persons in all appears.
